alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 11 at 11:03PM EST until November 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County. .Heavy rainfall associated with Nicole has caused river levels to rise on the Little Wekiva River. Drainage from surrounding areas has caused levels to continue a gradual rise, with the river reaching Minor Flood Stage. For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1045 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2n. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, Minor flooding near the river in the Altamonte Springs area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 28.8 feet by Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 hours) Location Stg Stg Day/Time 11pm 5am 11am 5pm 11am Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2 28.5 28.5 Fri 12 pm 28.5 28.6 28.8 28.7 28.5 &&
